Choe Thae Bok Meets Iranian Ambassador 
   Pyongyang, February 25 (KCNA) -- Choe Thae Bok, chairman of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, met and had a talk with Morteza Moradian, new Iranian ambassador to the DPRK who paid a courtesy call on him, at the Mansudae Assembly Hall today.

FM Meets Mongolian Ambassador 
   Pyongyang, February 25 (KCNA) -- Foreign Minister of the DPRK Pak Ui Chun met and had a talk with Janchivdorjyn Lomvo, Mongolian ambassador to the DPRK who paid a farewell call on him, on Monday.

DPRK Women Football Team Beats S. Korean Rival 
   Pyongyang, February 25 (KCNA) -- The DPRK women football team beat the south Korean rival 4:0 in a match of the East Asian Football Federation Women's Championship 2008 held in China on Sunday.
